welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Shirako, Japan! Known for its tranquil beaches, delicious seafood, and rich history, we invite you to immerse yourself in the charm of our beautiful city and experience all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay and make unforgettable memories in Shirako."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Narita International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The second terminal at Narita International Airport, primarily serving international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Narita International Airport, exclusively for low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, with no time limit.
